mn148:2.1: While this description of the Dhamma is frequently found, it is not elsewhere used as an introduction to a specific teaching.
mn148:9.3: We have now included the six sense fields, contact, feeling, and craving, which are four of the items of dependent origination.
mn148:10.1: This is an unusual use of _na upapajjati_ in the sense, “is not tenable”, “does not obtain”, or “is not justified”.
mn148:41.10: This is not found in parallel passages and is probably a later addition.
